title: Don Lemon to return to 'CNN This Morning' after training following comments on Nikki Haley's age
description: Anchor Don Lemon will return to work Wednesday after he receives formal training for his comments about Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley on “CNN This Morning,” network CEO Chris Licht said in an email to employees Monday night.

title: Supreme Court probes social media immunity in ISIS videos dispute
description: The Supreme Court hears arguments in Gonzalez v. Google, on whether tech companies are immune from legal liability in disputes over problematic user content.
